response: I am doing well, thank you for asking!  As a large language model, I don't experience emotions or feelings in the same way humans do, but I'm functioning optimally and ready to assist you. How can I help you today?
Hi there! How can I help you today?
I am a large language model, trained by Google.  I don't have a "group" in the human sense.  I am a single AI system.

As a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or feelings, including frustration or annoyance.  My responses are based on the data I was trained on.  If you feel I haven't followed a system prompt correctly, please provide the prompt and explain what you expected. I will do my best to understand and address your concerns.
